properties.label: Count
properties.name: count
properties.hint: The number of Salesforce Accounts that the search criteria matches.

properties.label: IPIMS Org ID
properties.name: ipims_org_id
properties.hint: When you define an IPIMS Org ID, this service will work up the tree IPIMS Org -> IPIMS Customer -> Salesforce Account to return all Accounts associated with the Org ID.

block.comment: Get all the Salesforce Accounts linked to this org id
